name: n8n
description: n8n - Secure Workflow Automation for Technical Teams. A workflow automation platform that gives technical teams the flexibility of code with the speed of no-code. With 400+ integrations, native AI capabilities, and a fair-code license.

N8N_PROTOCOL.description: Protocol for n8n (use https for production)

N8N_PORT.description: Port for n8n to bind to

N8N_HOST.description: Host domain name. Automatically set to your Heroku app domain.

N8N_EDITOR_BASE_URL.description: Public URL where n8n editor is accessible. Automatically set to your Heroku app URL.

WEBHOOK_URL.description: Webhook URL for external services. Automatically set to your Heroku app URL.

N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Encryption key for securing credentials and sensitive data. CRITICAL: Store this securely - all credentials will be lost if changed.

DB_POSTGRESDB_DATABASE.description: PostgreSQL database name. Automatically configured by Heroku PostgreSQL addon.

DB_POSTGRESDB_HOST.description: PostgreSQL host. Automatically configured by Heroku PostgreSQL addon.

DB_POSTGRESDB_PORT.description: PostgreSQL port. Automatically configured by Heroku PostgreSQL addon.

DB_POSTGRESDB_USER.description: PostgreSQL user. Automatically configured by Heroku PostgreSQL addon.

DB_POSTGRESDB_PASSWORD.description: PostgreSQL password. Automatically configured by Heroku PostgreSQL addon.

DB_POSTGRESDB_SSL_ENABLED.description: Enable SSL for PostgreSQL connection (required for Heroku Postgres)

DB_POSTGRESDB_SSL_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED.description: Whether to reject unauthorized SSL connections

N8N_COMMUNITY_PACKAGES_ENABLED.description: Enable community packages (nodes) installation and management

N8N_REINSTALL_MISSING_PACKAGES.description: Whether to reinstall any missing community packages on startup

N8N_UNVERIFIED_PACKAGES_ENABLED.description: Allow installation of unverified community packages

N8N_AI_ENABLED.description: Enable AI features and workflows including LangChain support

N8N_PYTHON_ENABLED.description: Enable Python execution in Code node for advanced AI workflows

GENERIC_TIMEZONE.description: Default timezone for the n8n instance

EXECUTIONS_DATA_PRUNE.description: Delete execution data after specified time to manage database size

EXECUTIONS_DATA_MAX_AGE.description: Max age in hours for execution data (336 = 14 days)

N8N_LOG_LEVEL.description: Log level for debugging and monitoring

scripts.postdeploy: echo 'n8n is starting up. Please wait a few moments for the service to be fully available.'
